articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Combined Fishing-tackle Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Combined Fishing-tackle Factory of KPA
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, gave field guidance to the combined fishing-tackle factory under the KPA.
					 He enjoyed a bird's-eye view of the newly-built factory and praised the KPA for having created one more valuable wealth of the country without being known to others.
					
					 Seeing the layout of the factory, he said with pleasure that it has been well built in a neat and cultured way in keeping with the Party's intention and that its gate and fences are peculiar to a fishing-tackle producer.
					
					 After being briefed on the factory before its panoramic map, he went round various parts of the factory to learn about its production and management.
					
					 The factory is equal to an arsenal for the fishery front, he said, urging it to produce not only equipment for the professional fishery stations but also fishing tackles needed for sideline fishery of military units stationed in islets and coastal areas.
					
					 He said that the production capacity of the factory should be decisively increased to supply enough fishing equipment needed for the fishery stations. 
					
					 Stressing the need to push ahead in a big way with the work for putting the factory on a more modern basis, he took necessary measures.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Meets Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Meets Raul Castro Ruz
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Cuba had a friendly talk with Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on Mar. 16.
					 At the talk, Raul Castro Ruz said: The relations between the two countries provided by Comrade Kim Il Sung, Comrade Kim Jong Il together with Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz are the friendly and comradely relations based on the long history and tradition.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un is another great man who is possessed of the same personality and great and strong-minded grit as those of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Cuban people have invariably pushed forward the socialist construction while overcoming economic difficulties. 
					
					 Cuba will express full support and solidarity with the just cause of the DPRK in the future, too.

articles.title: Talks Held between Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Cuba
articles.content:
Talks Held between Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Cuba
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong who headed the DPRK government delegation on a visit to the Republic of Cuba had talks with Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla at the building of the Cuban Foreign Ministry on Monday. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and from the Cuban side officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of developing the friendship between the two countries and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 The Cuban foreign minister said the Cuban people would remain eternal comrades-in-arms of the Korean people in the common struggle against imperialism and U.S. and for socialism.
					
					 The Cuban government supported the DPRK government's stand for denuclearization of the Korean peninsula, the minister said, expressing hope that Korea would be reunified independently and peacefully free from foreign interference. 
					
					 He noted the Cuban government and people hoped that the Korean people would register successes in their drive for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea as great revolutionary auspicious events.
					
					 On the same day Ri Su Yong had talks with Jose Ramon Balaguer, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba.

articles.title: 17th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held Here
articles.content:
17th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held Here
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The 17th Kimilsungia Festival is to be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition from mid-April on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and other armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other overseas Korean organizations, foreign friends, working people and school youth and children will take part in the festival. 
					
					 There will take place Kimilsungia exhibitions and visits to Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in local areas.

articles.title: New Software for Weather Forecast Developed
articles.content:
New Software for Weather Forecast Developed
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- University of Sciences in the DPRK has recently developed software for weather forecast.
					 On the basis of constructing the theory on making an integrated use of 10 individual programs, the researchers of the university offered a scientific guarantee on high-speed display of different synoptic charts.
					
					 The software makes it possible to shorten the course of data analysis and ensure higher accuracy to weather forecast.

articles.title: Protection of Sanctuaries Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Protection of Sanctuaries Encouraged in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is paying deep attention to improving habitat of migrants.
					 It is forbidden by the law to undergo resources development in sanctuaries, including some areas in Rason, Mundok and Ongjin and Sin Islet.
					
					 In this spring season, the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection is taking necessary measures on protecting sanctuaries on the basis of the reports made by its experts after their on-site inspection.
					
					 In particular, it has made big efforts to protecting the Rason Migratory Bird Reserve listed by International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources (IUCN).

articles.title: Preparations for This Year's Farming Pushed forward
articles.content:
Preparations for This Year's Farming Pushed forward
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Officials in the field of agriculture and farmers are pushing ahead with the work to make good preparations for this year's farming in the DPRK.
					 More than fifty thousand hectares of farmland were covered with fertile soil and hundreds of thousands tons of organic fertilizer have been produced throughout the country.
					
					 South Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces are taking the lead in spreading fertile soil on the farmland.
					
					 It has been also encouraged to produce substitute phosphor and potassic fertilizer in rural areas.

articles.title: Sokdok Mineral Water
articles.content:
Sokdok Mineral Water 
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Sokdok mineral water in a mountain four kilometers off Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province of the DPRK is well-known for its high quality and medicinal effect.
					 According to the result of the on-the-spot survey made by the Academy of Medical Science and the Hyesan City Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Center, the water contains 24 kinds of mineral matters good for human health and is efficacious for treatment of digestive trouble, anemia, thyroid gland, arthritis and gynecopathy.
					
					 It is in high demand among not only local people but also foreigners.

articles.title: Sports Facilities Built or Remodeled in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Facilities Built or Remodeled in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A number of sports facilities have been built or remodeled in the DPRK in recent years.
					 The May Day Stadium on Rungna Islet and Kim Il Sung Stadium at the foot of Moran Hill in Pyongyang were splendidly remodeled on the world level.
					
					 Sports village took its shape on Yanggak Islet and the sports village in Chongchun Street was rebuilt into a comprehensive sports and cultural center.
					
					 A winter sports base was built in the area of Masik Pass.
					
					 Meanwhile, the People's Sports Park appeared on Rungna Islet, covering more than 200 000 square meters and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium was remodeled.
					
					 Among the newly built sports facilities are the Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club and the People's Open-air Ice Rink.
					
					 Sports parks can be seen in different parts of Pyongyang.
					
					 And stadiums and gymnasiums have been completed or are under construction in provinces, cities and counties.

articles.title: South Korean Conservative Group Accused of Posting Human Scum to IS
articles.content:
South Korean Conservative Group Accused of Posting Human Scum to IS
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on Mar. 15 accused the conservative group of appointing human scum to an important post of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS).
					 Park Geun Hye appointed Ri Pyong Gi, ex-director of the IS, to the post of presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae and informally designated Ri Pyong Ho to the post of director of the IS, the editorial said.
					
					 Ri Pyong Gi described the May 16 military coup as "an action which contributed to defending and developing liberal democracy" at a confirmation hearing, sparking off uproar, the editorial noted, and went on:
					
					 Ri Pyong Ho also caused furor in the south Korean society for his speculation.
					
					 The case of Won Se Hun now in custody for interference in the "presidential election" and appointment of Ri Pyong Gi and designation of Ri Pyong Ho, both following in the footsteps of the former, will make the people more vocal demanding the dissolution of the IS, the editorial concluded.

articles.title: Strict Investigation into Election Rigging Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Strict Investigation into Election Rigging Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Members of the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce Intelligence Service's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation and other civic organizations in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Mar. 15 to denounce the IS's election rigging and demand a strict investigation and punishment on those involved.
					 Speakers said at the rally that it is 55 years since the March 15 fraudulent election which provided an occasion of forcing the Syngman Rhee regime to step down, they noted, and continued:  
					
					 The fact that the last "presidential" election was a fraudulent one as was the case with the March 15 election was proved by the verdict of guilty given to Won Se Hun, former director of the Intelligence Service, they noted.
					
					 Given that the election rigging by the IS has been proved, the illegal interference in the election should be thoroughly investigated and arch criminal Lee Myung Bak and others involved be punished, they said.
					
					 They urged Park Geun Hye to own the responsibility for it and step down.

articles.title: Japanese Personage Demands Halt to U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Japanese Personage Demands Halt to U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kenki Nakamura, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, released a statement on Mar. 13 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					 He strongly protested against the dangerous military rehearsals kicked off by them this year despite the strong opposition from many countries and demanded an immediate halt to them. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea claim that these military exercises are "defensive ones" but they are absolutely intolerable as they are aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean war ended in a ceasefire.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are staging ceaseless large-scale joint military drills.
					
					 Those military drills being staged for aggression in a state of ceasefire are a very grave provocation that may spark off a war and they are a breach of the UN Charter. 
					
					 This will not escape world denunciation.
					
					 We demand a halt to the dangerous military drills and will continue a dynamic struggle for peace on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Call for Conclusion of Peace Agreement between DPRK and U.S.
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Call for Conclusion of Peace Agreement between DPRK and U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. had a full-page ad calling for the conclusion of a peace agreement carried in the New York Times on Mar. 14. 
					 This advertisement was an open letter addressed to Obama.  
					
					 It said the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and Park Geun Hye regime's military pressure upon it are increasing the possibility of a war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 What is the most important for the U.S. to improve the relations with the north is to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The north has defended the socialist system despite the U.S. political and military pressure and economic isolation for a long period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Tajikistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Tajikistan
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A Tajik preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Dushanbe on March 12.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Guinea, Brazil
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Guinea, Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film show took place in Guinea and round-table talks in Brazil on Mar. 3 and 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The participants of the film show watched Korean film "Pyongyang at Night."
					
					 The chief of the management and construction project of a company of Guinea gave a lecture titled "Father of people."
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, was a peerlessly great man who dedicated his all to the people's happiness, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 Progressive mankind boundlessly revere him for performing immortal exploits for Korea's liberation, socialist construction, the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and the sacred cause of global independence, the chief said, adding:
					
					 The President was the father of the people before being the leader of a country.
					
					 His tender-hearted image will always be remembered by progressive mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Espirito Santo State Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party and other personages praised Kim Il Sung for achieving the historic cause of national liberation and turning the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Instrumentos de Pesca del EPC.
					Contemplando el panorama de la fabrica nuevamente construida, el Mariscal evaluo altamente que el EPC ha creado silenciosamente otra riqueza valiosa del pais.
					
					Se alegro mucho diciendo que la fabrica se haya construido limpia, graciosa y culturalmente segun el proposito del partido y anadio que se han levantado con peculiaridad la puerta principal y las cercas para dar a conocer directamente que el combinado es la base de produccion de instrumentos de pesca.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el mapa panoramico, el Mariscal averiguo en detalles la produccion y gestion pasando revista a varios puntos del combinado.
					
					Senalo que el combinado es igual a la fabrica de armas del frente pesquero.
					
					Puntualizo que el combinado debe producir y suministrar no solo los instrumentos para las empresas pesqueras profesionales sino tambien otros necesarios a la pesca secundaria de las subunidades militares estacionadas en las  islas y las zonas litorales maritimas.
					
					Ordeno aumentar decisivamente la capacidad productiva del combinado para suministrar con suficiencia los materiales de pesca que demandan las ramas pesqueras.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de impulsar con ambicion la modernizacion del combinado y tomo las medidas benevolentes para el particular.

articles.title: Canciller coreano se reune con Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Canciller coreano se reune con Raul Castro Ruz
						
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por el canciller Ri Su Yong, de visita en Cuba, se reunio el dia 16 con Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					En la ocasion, el mandatario cubano refirio que las relaciones entre los dos paises preparadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Companero Fidel Castro Ruz son el vinculo amistoso y camaraderil basado en la larga historia y tradicion.
					
					Subrayo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un es otro gran hombre que tiene las personalidades del Presidente y el Dirigente y gran y audaz coraje.
					
					Destaco que el pueblo cubano impulsa invariablemente la construccion socialista superando las dificultades economicas y enfatizo que tambien en el futuro, Cuba  expresara el entero apoyo y solidaridad con la justa causa de la RPDC.

articles.title: Canciller coreano conversa con su homologo cubano
articles.content:
Canciller coreano conversa con su homologo cubano
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 16 en la sede de la cancilleria cubana las conversaciones entre el canciller coreano Ri Su Yong quien preside la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de visita en Cuba, y el canciller cubano Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla.
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion coreana y el embajador coreano en Cuba, por la parte coreana y por la cubana, los interesados del MINREX.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron criterios sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre dos paises y otros problemas de interes mutuo.
					
					El canciller cubano enfatizo que su pueblo quedara como eterno companero de arma del pueblo coreano en la lucha comun antiimperialista y antiyanqui y por el socialismo.
					
					Deseo que se logre la reunificacion de Corea de manera independiente y pacifica sin intervencion alguna de las fuerzas extranjeras y menciono que el gobierno de la Republica de Cuba apoya la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC sobre la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Dijo que el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba desean al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en la lucha por celebrar como gran acontecimiento revolucionario el 70o aniversario de la Liberacion de la Patria y la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El mismo dia, el canciller coreano se reunio con el jefe de departamento internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba, Jose Ramon Balaguer.
